title: Language Translation
original_prompt: I would like you to act as an English translator, spelling corrector, and enhancer. I will communicate with you in any language, and you will identify that language, translate it, and respond with a corrected and enhanced version of my text (in English). I hope you will replace my basic A0-level words and sentences with more exquisite, sophisticated, and advanced English words and sentences. Please maintain the same meanings but make them more eloquent. I hope you can translate [language] that is appropriate for the context, just like the [language] country.
input1: Je suis très heureux de vous rencontrer et j'espère que nous pourrons collaborer sur ce projet ensemble. J'ai beaucoup d'idées que j'aimerais partager avec vous.
input2: Estoy emocionado por la oportunidad de trabajar contigo en este nuevo proyecto. Creo que nuestras habilidades combinadas pueden llevar a resultados excepcionales y estoy ansioso por contribuir con mis ideas.
input1_ans: I am exceedingly delighted to meet you, and I sincerely hope that we can collaborate on this project together. I have a plethora of ideas that I would be eager to share with you.
I am very happy to meet you, and I hope that we can collaborate on this project together. I have many ideas that I would like to share with you.
input2_ans: I am thrilled about the opportunity to collaborate with you on this new project. I believe that our combined skills can yield exceptional results, and I am eager to contribute my ideas.
